notes: The HRRP 4W tool is meant to provide an inventory of reporting activities that fall under the Housing Recovery & Reconstruction Platform (HRRP) framework. The datasets entail information on WHAT housing reconstruction activities is being planned and implemented by WHO (partner organizations), WHERE are the activities in VDC level and WHEN. In addition, the datasets also provide information on the number of beneficiaries/constructions, for the potentially measurement of process and impact.
